app_overview.name: FoodFlow
app_overview.purpose: A platform for sharing surplus food to reduce food waste
main_features: Real-time messaging between donors and receivers

DONOR.description: Users who share surplus food with the community
common_questions: How do I verify the pickup code?

RECEIVER.description: Users who claim and collect shared food from the community

ADMIN.description: Platform administrators who manage users and content

steps: Post food donation with details (type, quantity, location, expiry)
Wait for receivers to claim the donation
Communicate with receiver via in-app messaging
Enter the pickup code shown by the receiver in the app to confirm pickup
Mark donation as completed after successful pickup
key_features: Coordinate pickup timing and enter the receiver's pickup code to confirm pickup

receiver_workflow.description: How receivers claim and collect food
steps: Browse available donations in their area
Message donor to coordinate pickup details
Arrive at pickup location at agreed time
Show pickup code to donor for verification (donor enters it in the app)
Collect food and mark as received
key_features: Filter donations by location, food type, availability

claims.process: Receiver claims → Donor approves → Coordinate pickup → Receiver shows pickup code → Exchange food
claims.verification: Pickup codes ensure security and proper handoff

messaging.description: Built-in chat system for donors and receivers
messaging.purpose: Coordinate pickup details, ask questions about food items
messaging.access: Available after a claim is made

pickup_codes.description: Security codes (OTP) shown to receivers during pickup windows
pickup_codes.generation: Automatically shown when the pickup window becomes active
pickup_codes.usage: Receivers show this OTP to donors during food pickup for verification
pickup_codes.security: Ensures legitimate pickups and prevents unauthorized collection
pickup_codes.visibility: Only visible to receivers during active pickup windows
pickup_codes.location: Displayed in receiver's claim details (pickup steps) when the pickup window is open
pickup_codes.donor_access: Donors do not generate or view OTPs; they only verify the code shown by the receiver
pickup_codes.donor_action: Donors confirm pickup by entering the receiver's OTP in the app

getting_started.account_creation: Users can register as donors, receivers, or both. Email verification required. Choose role based on primary use.
getting_started.profile_setup: Add personal info, location (for distance calculations), language preference, profile photo, and notification settings
getting_started.language_change: Available in Settings → Language preference. Supports EN/FR/ES/PT/AR/ZH with immediate interface updates
getting_started.role_switching: Users can have both donor and receiver capabilities. Set primary role in profile settings.

donations.how_to_donate: Go to Create Donation → Fill details → Add photos → Post
donations.edit_donations: Manage Donations → Select item → Edit details
donations.donation_visibility: Visible to receivers within your set radius
donations.cancelling: Available until someone claims the donation

claiming.how_to_claim: Browse donations → Select item → Click Claim
claiming.multiple_claims: Receivers can claim multiple donations simultaneously
claiming.claim_limits: No strict limits, but consider what you can actually collect

communication.messaging_system: Built-in chat available between donors and receivers after claim is made and approved
communication.messaging_donors: Receivers can message donors after successful claim. Access via Messages tab or claim details page
communication.messaging_receivers: Donors can message receivers after claim approval. Access via Messages tab or donation details page
communication.coordinating_pickup: Discuss timing, exact location, special instructions, dietary questions, quantity adjustments
communication.message_etiquette: Be respectful, respond promptly, confirm pickup details, notify of changes or delays
communication.blocked_users: Users can block inappropriate contacts. Reported users may be suspended by admins

pickup_process.getting_pickup_code: RECEIVERS: OTP appears in claim details during the pickup steps when the pickup window is active
pickup_process.providing_pickup_code: RECEIVERS: Show OTP to donor in person during pickup for verification
pickup_process.pickup_locations: Set by donors, can be home address or public meeting point
pickup_process.timing: Coordinate pickup times via messaging, OTP becomes active during agreed window
pickup_process.verification_process: Receiver shows OTP → Donor enters OTP in app → Food handoff completed
pickup_process.donor_confirmation: DONORS: You confirm pickup by entering the receiver's OTP in the app. You never generate or display the OTP.

account_issues.email_verification: Check spam folder first. Click 'Resend verification' on login page. Email should arrive within 5 minutes. Contact support if still missing after 15 minutes.
account_issues.password_reset: Use 'Forgot Password' link on login page. Check email (including spam). Reset link expires in 24 hours. If no email arrives, ensure you're using the correct email address.
account_issues.profile_updates_not_saving: Changes save automatically after clicking 'Save'. If changes don't appear, refresh page. Clear browser cache if problem persists.
account_issues.language_not_changing: Go to Settings → Language → Select preferred option → Click 'Save Changes'. Interface should update immediately. Refresh page if needed.
account_issues.account_locked: Account may be temporarily suspended. Check email for notification. Contact support if you believe this is an error.

donation_issues.donation_not_showing: Check if donation is still active. Verify location radius covers your area. Ensure donation hasn't expired or been claimed by someone else.
donation_issues.cannot_edit_donation: Once claimed by a receiver, donations can only be cancelled, not edited. Contact the receiver via Messages to discuss changes.
donation_issues.no_claims_on_donation: Try: Adding more photos and detailed description, adjusting pickup radius to wider area, checking expiry date isn't too soon, posting during peak hours (evening/weekends).
donation_issues.donation_disappeared: Donation may have expired, been claimed, or removed by admin. Check 'My Donations' history for status updates.

claiming_issues.claim_failed: Donation may have just been claimed by another user. Try refreshing the page and browsing for other available options.
claiming_issues.cannot_find_claimed_donation: Check 'My Claims' section in your dashboard. Look for claim confirmation email. Ensure you're logged into the correct account.
claiming_issues.pickup_coordination_problems: Use the messaging system to contact the donor. Be specific about your availability and location questions. Receivers should provide the pickup code when requested.

messaging_issues.cannot_send_message: Messaging is only available after a claim is made and approved by the donor. Check that your claim status is 'APPROVED'.
messaging_issues.messages_not_loading: Check internet connection. Refresh page. Clear browser cache. Try logging out and back in.
messaging_issues.inappropriate_messages: Report users via their profile page. Block users to stop receiving messages. Admins review all reports within 24 hours.

pickup_code_issues.missing_pickup_code: RECEIVERS: OTP appears in claim details during active pickup window. Check claim status and pickup time.
pickup_code_issues.pickup_code_not_working: RECEIVERS: Ensure pickup window is active. OTP is only valid during scheduled pickup time. Contact the donor if issues persist.
pickup_code_issues.where_to_find_pickup_code: Receivers: Go to 'My Claims' → Select your claim → Pickup steps → OTP appears when pickup window is active
pickup_code_issues.pickup_window_not_active: Coordinate with donor via messages to confirm pickup time. OTP only appears during agreed pickup window.
pickup_code_issues.donor_no_code: DONORS: You will not see the OTP. Ask the receiver to show it at pickup and enter it in the Confirm Pickup screen.

technical_issues.app_not_loading: Check internet connection. Try different browser. Clear cache and cookies. Disable browser extensions temporarily.
technical_issues.photos_not_uploading: Ensure image is under 5MB. Use JPG, PNG formats. Check camera permissions in browser. Try different browser if problem persists.
technical_issues.location_not_working: Enable location permissions in browser settings. Try manual address entry if GPS fails. Check that location services are enabled on device.

food_safety: Only donate food that you would eat yourself
Respect expiry dates and food freshness
Be honest about food condition and any allergens
community_guidelines: Report inappropriate behavior or safety concerns
platform_rules: Accurate location and contact information required
No commercial selling - only genuine surplus sharing

app_features: Real-time notifications for claims and messages
technical_support.browser_support: Works on all modern browsers (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge)
technical_support.mobile_support: Responsive design works on phones and tablets
technical_support.accessibility: Screen reader compatible, keyboard navigation supported
